item.description:
It'll be a beautiful day in the neighborhood. Reports say 81 degrees and sunny! So join us for a nice brisk walk around Boston Common and some healthy dinner at UFood Grill afterwards. Of course good conversation and meeting new peeps is always a plus!

Meeting place: The fountain on the East side of Boston Common, due Southwest of the Park Street Station. Call/text my phone if you can't find us or if you join us later. 773-290-7859

Rain alternative: Sara H offered to host at her place in the Downtown area, very close to the Common. Just in case the weather turns sour...we still can meet!

If you aren't part of FatBet, or if you want to get involved, or if you just want good friendly convo during a nice brisk walk...then join us! The more the merrier!

FatBet - A 12 week bet, all participants put $10 into the pot. First people to their weight loss goals gets the pot of $$$.
Check out the current stats http://www.fatbet.net...
item.how_to_find_us: Call my cell, meet at the Fountain across the street from the Paulist Chapel
item.name: FatBet - Walk the Common
